attributes.action: Ask banks to freeze personal/business loan/mortgages automatically for 6 months
attributes.additional_details: To beat hardship  caused by Corona Virus, resulting in difficulties paying staff wages, rent, bills, mortgages, personal loan and business loan repayments. Without this more business will closed down and staff will be made redundant and people might lose homes and become homeless.
attributes.background: Request the government to instruct all banks to freeze loan repayment on all loans automatically including small business loan and mortgages for 6 months without questions asked.

rejection.details:
Suspending payments for mortgages and loans is a matter for mortgage providers and lenders, and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out about asking for a mortgage holiday from lenders here: https://www.fca.org.uk/consumers/mortgages-coronavirus-consumers 

You can find out about what Government support is available for businesses as a result of coronavirus here: https://www.businesssupport.gov.uk/

If you want the Government to encourage lenders, landlords and utilities to freeze payments during lockdown, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256
